name: ponyProject
description:
** Sorry for the awkward controls. Initially was designed around a Snes Controller

Controls:

Left & Right Arrow Keys

Look at top left of screen for other functions.

*Pegasus can double jump

*Unicorn can teleport when charge is held long enough

*Earth Pony can jump on walls / she also has to be sprinting for her to use shield bash

** Some abilities aren't yet implemented and some do nothing but play an animation

Enjoy :D
